00028 #ifndef __D3D11PIXELBUFFER_H__
00029 #define __D3D11PIXELBUFFER_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgreD3D11Prerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreHardwarePixelBuffer.h"
00033 #include "OgreD3D11Driver.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00037     class D3D11HardwarePixelBuffer: public HardwarePixelBuffer
00038     {
00039     protected:
00041         PixelBox lockImpl(const Image::Box lockBox,  LockOptions options);
00042 
00044         void unlockImpl(void);
00045 
00047         D3D11Device & mDevice;
00048 
00049         D3D11Texture * mParentTexture;
00050         size_t mSubresourceIndex;
00051 
00052         // if the usage is static - alloc at lock then use device UpdateSubresource when unlock and free memory
00053         int8 * mDataForStaticUsageLock; 
00054 
00055         size_t mFace;
00056 
00057         Image::Box mLockBox;
00058         PixelBox mCurrentLock;
00059 
00060         D3D11_BOX OgreImageBoxToDx11Box(const Image::Box &inBox) const;
00061 
00063         void fromD3DLock(PixelBox &rval, const DXGI_MAPPED_RECT &lrect);
00064 
00066         typedef vector<RenderTexture*>::type SliceTRT;
00067         SliceTRT mSliceTRT;
00068     public:
00069         D3D11HardwarePixelBuffer(D3D11Texture * parentTexture, D3D11Device & device, size_t subresourceIndex,
00070             size_t width, size_t height, size_t depth, size_t face, PixelFormat format, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage);
00071 
00073         void blit(const HardwarePixelBufferSharedPtr &src, const Image::Box &srcBox, const Image::Box &dstBox);
00074 
00076         void blitFromMemory(const PixelBox &src, const Image::Box &dstBox);
00077 
00079         void blitToMemory(const Image::Box &srcBox, const PixelBox &dst);
00080 
00082         void _genMipmaps();
00083 
00084 
00085         ~D3D11HardwarePixelBuffer();
00086 
00088         RenderTexture *getRenderTarget(size_t zoffset);
00089 
00091         virtual void _clearSliceRTT(size_t zoffset)
00092         {
00093             if (mSliceTRT.size() > zoffset)
00094             {
00095                 mSliceTRT[zoffset] = 0;
00096             }
00097         }
00098 
00099         D3D11Texture * getParentTexture() const;
00100         size_t getSubresourceIndex() const;
00101         size_t getFace() const;
00102     };
00103 };
00104 #endif
